column1: MRI snapshot size (256, 128, 1) with weighting in T2 describing the skull of a man of age  of 37 years old, of axial section n°174 from the base of the skull. The observed details include: the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 1605.7617 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 3841.6992 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 1543.7988 mm³ and the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4030.2246 mm³.
